meaning: The responsiveness of quantity supplied or demanded in relation to changes in price/income/other products.
Where one variable (Price or quantity) is fixed and the other variable cannot change it.
When PED is greater than 1 and A % change in price results in greater % change in quantity demanded.

The responsiveness in quantity demanded to a change in price. 
Formula: % change in QD / % Change in P

When PED is less than 1 and quantity demanded is not very responsive to a change in price.
Formula: % change in Qs / % change in P
